column4: can somebody help me with installing netbeans on hardy ? synaptic tell me that some packages are missing and with apt-get install an error comes up..
post your apt-get output to a !pastebin
german is ok, i can translate --, you can do this if the output is quite long.  which pastebinit || sudo apt-get install pastebinit &&  apt-get install netbeans
and give us the URL the command returns
sorry for my noobnes, but i'm stuck with the command : sudo pastebinit || sudo apt-get install pastebinit &&  apt-get install netbeans..it say , are you root ?
err, my bad.    sudo pastebinit || sudo apt-get install pastebinit; sudo apt-get install netbeans
err, bad command, actually, just run   sudo apt-get install netbeans
i'm not concentrating very well today.  if you get errors on that apt-get command .. then rerun it this way.    sudo apt-get install netbeans | pastebinit
it say , no arguments specified..
this is all one command.    sudo apt-get install netbeans | pastebinit
ahh ok : http://pastebin.com/f12389cf0
can you give us the url this returns too?   pastebinit < /etc/apt/sources.list
: http://pastebin.com/f75941ce0
are you running hardy at the moment? did you upgrade from edgy to hardy?
upgraded from feisty running hardy now... ,the packages are missing right? .. i think i will try it by myself now again, and just paste server in that file right ?
no, you need to comment out these edgy repos you still have enabled in /etc/apt/sources.list -- then run something like.   sudo aptitude update; sudo aptitude install netbeans
okey..
only the one in row 24 right ?
and 14 and 15 too
err, sorry, they are already comment out -- so yea, just 24
glad to know that .. yay! :)
i don't necessarily mean monetary donations -- contributions of any kind are welcome, t-shirts, pizza, beer, etc :)  j/k
it was a joke :) but if you have any cool ones you think the team can benefit from .. :)
